thread.title: Sexual Predator PCSO employed by Humberside Police.
thread.title_full: Sexual Predator PCSO employed by Humberside Police.

title: Sexual Predator PCSO employed by Humberside Police.
text: [news] 09:41 In addition to the 2012 incident of the story, there are four previous incidents, he is still employed as a PCSO and no criminal or disciplinary action has been taken.[quote]the PCSO was also investigated by Humberside Police for "inappropriate sexual behaviour" while on duty. It further reveals that three other "potential victims" of the PCSO were identified from police records. None of the people involved were interviewed or spoken to by officers from Humberside Police[/quote]
